PresentationPage.title: Stop losing your passwords
PresentationPage.description: Keep your passwords safe in your Cozy
PresentationPage.item1: Your passwords will be saved once and for all in your 100% personal and secured safe.
PresentationPage.item2: Your cozy will allow you to instantly fill in the forms of websites, for easy connection to all your services.
PresentationPage.item3: You can connect your brands to your Cozy to recover your data in the blink of an eye.

notSupportedInfos.title: Not available on %{browser}
notSupportedInfos.description: The feature is currently not available on %{browser}. You can however take advantage of it on the following browsers:

SecurityPage.title: Improve your cozy password
SecurityPage.description: The password of your Cozy becomes the unique key to decrypt your securely stored passwords

advices.strong_passphrase: **Privilege a strong password:** A long password with numbers and special characters will be impossible to break.
advices.memorize: **Memorize it well:** In case of loss, you will not be able to recover the encrypted passwords in your cozy.
advices.our_tip: **Our tip:** Find a short phrase that suits you, for example:

HintPage.title: Leave a password hint
HintPage.description: The hint will be sent to you by email in case you forgot your password, choose a hint that only you can understand

InstallationPage.title: Install Cozy extension
InstallationPage.descriptionEnd: to your browser. This installation is necessary to allow you to automatically fill in and save your passwords while browsing.

step1.chrome: Click below to open the Chrome Web Store
step1.firefox: Click below to open Firefox Add-ons

InstallationPage.step3: Log in with your address **%{address}** and your password!

InstallationPageMobile.title: Install the Cozy Pass App
InstallationPageMobile.description: Access your credentials on the go, and automatically fill forms on your mobile.

InstalledPage.title: It's almost finished!
InstalledPage.descriptionEnd: icon on the top right corner of your screen to log in with your address **%{address}** and your Cozy password.

ConnectedPage.title: Your password manager is configured!
ConnectedPage.description: Go to your Cozy browser extension to manage your passwords

Help.faq: __Help:__ I can't connect
Help.import: Import my credentials from another manager

AvailablePlatforms.text: Find the Cozy extension on the following platforms:

imported.title: Credentials imported
imported.content: You can now find your credentials in your Cozy vault.

errored.title: Error while importing your credentials
errored.content: There was an error while importing your credentials. Please try again.

manifest.long_description:
Keep your passwords safe in your Cozy.

Your passwords are saved once and for all in your 100% personal and secured safe.

Your Cozy allows you to instantly fill in the forms of websites, for easy connection to all your services.

Connect your brands to your Cozy to recover your data in the blink of an eye.
